scripts.build: npm run compile-css && node js/production-checklist.js && webpack --mode production && node js/generate-email-configs.js
scripts.compile-css: npm run compile-styles && npm run compile-resbeat && npm run compile-dark
scripts.compile-styles: node-sass ./styles/sass/main-styles/styles.scss ./styles/sass/main-styles/styles.css && concat -o ./styles/concat-css/styles.concat.css ./styles/styles.css ./styles/sass/main-styles/styles.css && postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 4 versions' ./styles/concat-css/styles.concat.css -o ./styles/prefix-css/styles.prefix.css && node-sass ./styles/prefix-css/styles.prefix.css styles/compressed/styles.css --output-style compressed
scripts.compile-resbeat: node-sass ./styles/sass/resbeat-styles/resbeat.scss ./styles/sass/resbeat-styles/resbeat.css && concat -o ./styles/concat-css/resbeat.concat.css ./styles/resbeat.css ./styles/sass/resbeat-styles/resbeat.css && postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 4 versions' ./styles/concat-css/resbeat.concat.css -o ./styles/prefix-css/resbeat.prefix.css && node-sass ./styles/resbeat.css styles/compressed/resbeat.css --output-style compressed
scripts.compile-dark: node-sass ./styles/sass/dark-styles/dark.scss ./styles/sass/dark-styles/dark.css && concat -o ./styles/concat-css/dark.concat.css ./styles/dark.css ./styles/sass/dark-styles/dark.css && postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 4 versions' ./styles/concat-css/dark.concat.css -o ./styles/prefix-css/dark.prefix.css && node-sass ./styles/dark.css styles/compressed/dark.css --output-style compressed
